result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angel Luis Velazquez Jr

records.addlTxt: Letter to court from defense counsel, filed

Defendant Angel Luis Velazquez Jr appeared by video.  Attorney Christopher John Ertl appeared by video for Angel Luis Velazquez Jr.  Prosecuting attorney M Samir Siddique in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt. 
Defense has not received discovery from prior counsel. Case adjourned for another status conference by Zoom, Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Angel Luis Velazquez Jr appeared by video.  Attorney Christopher John Ertl appeared by video for Angel Luis Velazquez Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for a status conference. Defense does not have discovery or an offer. Case adjourned.
Status conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Angel Luis Velazquez in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Angel Luis Velazquez appeared by video means with Attorney.
Case in court for a status conference. Defense moves to withdraw due to a breakdown in communication. Court grants motion. State Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel.
Case adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Angel Luis Velazquez in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel has discovery but not an offer and requests additional status conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 30.
  Status conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Angel Luis Velazquez in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Angel Luis Velazquez appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel requests status conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 30.  Status conference scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Angel Luis Velazquez in court.  Emily S Zimmel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 30 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 04/28/2022@02:30pm
